name: Mediterranean Slaw
description: Add some pep to your regular coleslaw routine! This colourful and crunchy slaw brings a Mediterranean flair to mealtime with dill, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar. Pre-shredded coleslaw saves you time and still gives you all the health benefits of cabbage, like Vitamin C and fibre. Pack it for your next picnic or BBQ potluck.

ingredients.name: Coleslaw Dressing Mix or Lemon Dilly Dip Mix

preparation: In a large bowl, whisk mix with oil and vinegar. Add coleslaw mix.
Using 4-in-1 Mandoline or box grater with large holes, shave cucumber and cauliflower into bowl.
Add pumpkin seeds and toss to combine.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and a roll with 2 tsp butter.

products.name: Coleslaw Dressing Mix
summary: The ultimate summer salad, just add a few simple ingredients to make the most delish coleslaw with notes of dill and a hint of sweetness. Each jar makes 6 cups of creamy or vinaigrette-style dressing so you can easily feed a crowd at a backyard barbecue.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: 4-in-1 Mandoline
summary: Perfect for cutting thin slices & shredding veggies. 4 slicer settings: 2 slice & 2 julienne options.
